snippet: If the Lakers are to return to greatness, it will probably begin with a two-man game: Steve Nash to Dwight Howard, picking and rolling defenses to the brink of madness.
abstract: Los Angeles Lakers guard Steve Nash and center Dwight Howard are expected to perfect the pick-and-roll, stirring visions of another victory parade down Figueroa Street; but at one point during preseason negotiations the two players seemed destined to become rivals, with Nash weighing offers from New York Knicks and Howard pushing to join Brooklyn Nets.
lead_paragraph: If the Lakers are to return to greatness, it will probably begin with a two-man game: Steve Nash to Dwight Howard, picking and rolling defenses to the brink of madness.

headline.seo: Nash and Howard Cross Paths, Creating Imposing Pair
headline.main: How Nash and Howard Almost Became Rivals
headline.print_headline: How Nash and Howard Almost Became Rivals
